Pechincheiro: Níveis dessa habilidade tornam possível reinvidicar mais equipamento por menos Pontos de Recurso. (Habilidade do Grupo)
Cada ponto aumenta o número máximo de tropas que você pode comandar em 5, aumenta a moral do grupo e reduz os salários da tropa em 5%%. (Habilidade de Líder)
Every level of this skill increases maximum number of prisoners by %d. (Leader skill)
This skill helps you make other people accept your point of view. (Personal skill)
Each point to this skill both decreases the time to craft and upgrade equipment, and allows better quality upgrades. (Party skill)
Heroes regain 5%% per skill level of hit-points lost during mission. (Party skill)
Each point to this skill gives a 4%% chance that a mortally struck party member will be wounded rather than killed. (Party skill)
A velocidade de cura do grupo é aumentada em 20%% por nível dessa habilidade. (Habilidade do Grupo)
Aumenta a capacidade do inventário em +6 por cada level desta habilidade. (Habilidade do Líder)
Party seeing range is increased by 10%% per skill level. (Party skill)
Party map speed is increased by 3%% per skill level. (Party skill)
Every two levels of this skill increases starting battle advantage by 1. (Party skill)

Every day, each hero with this skill adds some experience to every other member of the party whose level is lower than his/hers. Experience gained goes as: {0,4,10,16,23,30,38,46,55,65,80}. (Personal skill)
This skill increases the amount of loot obtained by 10%% per skill level. (Party skill)
Reduces damage and accuracy penalties for archery and throwing when mounted. (Personal skill)
enables you to ride horses (or other beasts) of higher difficulty levels and increases your riding speed and manuever. (Personal skill)
reduces damage to shields (by 8%% per skill level) and improves shield speed and coverage. (Personal skill)
makes it easier to learn weapon proficiencies and increases the proficiency limits. Limits go as: 60, 100, 140, 180, 220, 260, 300, 340, 380, 420. (Personal skill)
lets character use more powerful bows. Each point to this skill (up to four plus power-draw requirement of the bow) increases bow damage by 14%%. (Personal skill)
Each point to this skill increases throwing damage by 10%%. (Personal skill)
Cada ponto nesta habilidade aumenta o dano físico em 8%%. (Habilidade Pessoal)
Cada ponto nesta habilidade aumenta sua vida em +2. (Habilidade Pessoal)
